messages.message: I feel like I can't get out of bed today.
Nothing seems to matter anymore.
I’m just exhausted all the time.
I feel so empty inside.
I can’t remember the last time I felt happy.
Every day feels like a struggle.
I’m not sure I can keep going like this.
It’s hard to find any reason to keep trying.
I don’t even know what’s wrong with me.
I feel like I’m sinking deeper every day.
I just want to disappear.
I feel like no one cares.
Everything feels pointless.
I’ve been feeling so numb lately.
Even the smallest tasks feel impossible.
Why do I feel so broken all the time?
I don’t have the energy to keep pretending I’m okay.
I’m losing hope that things will ever get better.
I don’t know how to make this pain stop.
I wish I could just escape everything.
